subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray defeated Jo-Wilfried Tsonga to advance to the Wimbledon final, where he will try to become the first Briton to win the men’s singles title since Fred Perry in 1936.
snippet: Andy Murray defeated Jo-Wilfried Tsonga to advance to the Wimbledon final, where he will try to become the first Briton to win the men’s singles title since Fred Perry in 1936.
